<h2 class="section-title">{{ .titles.about }}</h2>

The Statistical Methods in Imaging conference is an annual meeting of statisticians working on
methodology, theory, and applications in imaging science. This year, the conference will be
conducted over three days: the first day will include a hackathon, and the second and third days will
include invited talks as well as collaborative case study presentations. A poster reception will also
occur on the evening of the second day of the conference. This conference is targeted towards
methodologists and quantitative scientists interested in imaging analytics and epidemiology.
